[docs]class GlacierPointV2(YosemiteV2):

[docs]    def __init__(self, host):
        super(GlacierPointV2, self).__init__(host)
        self.product_name = "Glacier Point V2"
        self.bmc = OpenBMCGlacierPointV2



[docs]    def check_project_type(self, fru_details):
        if self.product_name in fru_details:
            return True



[docs]    def get_device_ports(self):
        gpv2_pcie_ports = {
            "switch" : {
                "port1" : "17:00.0",
                "port2" : "17:00.1",
            },
            "mdot2" : {
                "port1" : "18:00.0",
                "port2" : "18:01.0",

                "port10" : "66:01.0",
                "port11" : "66:02.0",
                "port12" : "66:03.0",
            }
        }
        return gpv2_pcie_ports
